refnamediv.refpurpose: Return one column name of the result set

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the name of a field (i.e., the column name) in the result set, or &false; on error.
For "immediate" queries, or for dynamic columns, an empty string is returned.

note.para: The column index is zero-based, not one-based as in SESAM.

refsect1.para: See also: sesam_field_array. It provides an easier interface to access the column names and types, and allows for detection of "multiple fields".
